evidence.text: Person B: I know predators, and those, are predators.

Person B: Only one animal is big enough to stop this.
Person A: We, have suddenly taken an interest in your project.
Person B: We can fight them off as many times as we need to.
Person A: You know, I’ll be chasing you again tomorrow. Nah, just kidding.
Person B: Well, if I know Roz, she’s making a plan to come back. And a Rozzum always completes its task.
